price: 57. Mpe bazali kopesa Allah bana basi, nkembo naye! Kasi bazali komipesa oyo bango moko balingi.
arabic: وَيَجۡعَلُونَ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡبَنَٰتِ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَلَهُم مَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wayajʿalūna lillahi al-banāti sub'ḥānahu walahum mā yashtahūna
